channel.title: Wargames2.net
channel.description:
all this is one of the best turn based games you will ever play !!!!! it is a world wide game so you can fight /talk/or spy on other peoples nations i have a link to this game that when you sighn up you will get bonus turns and money because i reffered you to it to get this bonus go to the following [url=http://www.wargames2.net/GameIndex.aspx?RefID=34703]http://www.wargames2.net/GameIndex.aspx?RefID=34703[/url] and click on sign up / then follow the prompts. this is the best turn based game i will ever play and i think it is worth looking in to.
i confirm that the site is safe and legit. click the link to go to the home page then click sign up/ :) happy playing ;D
